What are the treatments for alpha-mannosidosis ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of alpha-mannosidosis:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Alpha-Mannosidosis  - Genetic Testing Registry: Deficiency of alpha-mannosidase   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health conditions:  - Diagnostic Tests  - Drug Therapy  - Surgery and Rehabilitation  - Genetic Counseling   - Palliative Care,GHR,alpha-mannosidosis
